name: Ulead File Object
summary: Learn about .UFO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: UFO files can be opened by Ulead Photo Explorer, but multi-layer images may not appear correctly.
NOTE: Ulead was acquired by Corel, and PhotoImpact is now discontinued.

description: A UFO file is a raster image primarily created by Ulead PhotoImpact (now Corel PhotoImpact), but also recognized by other photo and video editing applications developed by Ulead. It may include multiple editing layers, similar to a Photoshop (.PSD) document.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ufo file in Glyphs 2.4
images.caption: UFO file open in Glyphs 2.4
